short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Since opening local file links is disabled in Chrome, this extension allows to open them. (in html/svg a tags)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome disables links to local files (file://).
This extension enables you to open those links.
